title: disconnect from chat service
body: My account can't connect to the chat service after the update, anyone else have same issue?

replies.body:
I'm not seeing any issues with chat currently.  Your network might be having an issue connecting to the chat server, so give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go to get this fixed up.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!

Edit: I spoke too soon!

He said just one minute before the server status changed and ranked was disabled.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Indeed!  An update has been posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Looks like there are some chat issues going on now.  Hold tight!
I am also having this problem though so its not just this person
i have the same thing happening. I hope it gets fixed it soon

what is going on... 
so everyone having same issue???
Not only you I guess, I got DC'ed too
